content: https://unitsofmeasure.org/ucum.html certificate expired at the end of October by the looks of it. Does anyone know who to contact about this? @Daniel Vreeman
Dan is no longer at Regenstrief. Would be @Burke Mamlin ?
Thanks for the heads up, I've let the folks at Regenstrief know about this. They are the SDO home for UCUM.
